name: root-fossil
effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive a lileep.
short_effect: Can be revived into a Lileep.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A fossil of an ancient, seafloor- dwelling POKéMON.
flavor_text.emerald: A fossil of an ancient, seafloor- dwelling POKéMON.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A fossil of an ancient, seafloor- dwelling POKéMON. It appears to be part of a plant root.
